attributes.action: Make it Law that No Finance Credit / Lending eg Loan, Hire Purchase APR of More than 30% above the Bank of England Base Lending Rate
attributes.additional_details: Make it Law that No Finance Lending eg Loans, Hire Purchase, Credit Cards, Store Cards etc That Operate in the UK, even if they are Based Outside the UK Can Charge a APR of More than 30% above the Bank of England Base Lending Rate
